ai-patthana15.66:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously for him.
ai-patthana15.66:0.3_0: Talking for achieving what is skillful,
ai-patthana15.66:1.1_0: A skillful quality doesn’t give rise to skillful qualities.”
ai-patthana15.66:1.1_1: Not knowing the skillful teaching there’s no cause or condition.
ai-patthana15.66:1.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana15.66:2.1_0: Enjoying the teaching doesn’t give rise to unskillful qualities, or cause conditioned by way of body.
ai-patthana15.66:2.1_3: What are the two kinds of temperament?
